|brand = ASUS |model = Tinker Board |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 2S (2G/16G) |revision = R1.02 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399;RK3399 (OP1); |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 2.0 GHz <!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L512EMI-10G; |flash2size = 64 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F8E304HB-MGCJ; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = FC:34:97 |oui = 70:66:55
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.2 (Gen 1), Mini PCIe (NGFF M.2), Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12-19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 2-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5, HDMI 2.0a, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, SPDIF out, I2S, SPI, I2C, UART, RTC |addchip = Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 8Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;STMicroelectronics;M24C08WP;;1;,,, High-Side Power Distribution Controller;ANPEC;APL3542;;1;,,, 4.5-18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54328;;1;,,, Adjustable Current-Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2557;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Green Solution Tech;GS7163;;1;,,, 4.5-24V 8A Synchronous Step-Down Voltage Regulator;TI;TPS51396A;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2021 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 192876952108 |ean = 4718017952101 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08V51FHB8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CB375NF |rad1modif = M.2 |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8822CE;RTL8822CE-CG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 (OP1) : Dual Core Cortex-A72 (@2.0GHz) and Quad Core Cortex-A53 (@1.5GHz) *GPU: Mali-T860 MP4 @800MHz (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *RAM: 2GB Dual Channel (SDRAM) LPDDR4 *Storage: 16GB eMMC 5.1, 64 KB SPI NOR, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *WiFi: Dual-band 802.11 bgn+ac WiFi 5 *USB: 3x USB 3.2 Gen1 host ports, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C OTG port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 12~19V DC Power power adapter (5.5/2.5 mm)
==Links of Interest== *https://www.asus.com/us/Single-Board-Computer/Tinker-Board-2S/HelpDesk_Download/ *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_Tinker_Board ''Asus Tinker Board'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/tinker-board-2-sbc-advances-to-rk3399/ ''Tinker Board 2 SBC advances to RK3399'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/asus-announces-rockchip-rk3399-powered-tinker-board-2-tinker-board-2s-single-board-computers-f63db64b37af ''ASUS Announces Rockchip RK3399-Powered Tinker Board 2'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/11/23/asus-unveils-tinker-board-2-sbc-with-faster-rockchip-rk3399-op1-processor/ ''ASUS unveils Tinker Board 2 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
